results.name: The Dry
results.description: The Dry is a gripping Australian crime drama based on the bestselling novel by Jane Harper. It follows Federal Agent Aaron Falk, who returns to his drought-stricken hometown after a twenty-year absence to attend the funeral of his childhood friend. His friend's death is thought to be a result of the town's desperation, but Falk stays to investigate the truth behind the crime, uncovering secrets that have long plagued the community.

results.name: Eric Bana
results.description: Eric Bana stars as Federal Agent Aaron Falk in the crime drama 'The Dry'. Bana's compelling portrayal of the protagonist has received critical acclaim. Known for his roles in 'Munich', 'Hulk', and 'Troy', Bana brings a depth of character to this complex narrative.

results.name: Robert Connolly
results.description: Robert Connolly is the director of 'The Dry'. His direction artfully captures the novel's tense atmosphere and the Australian outback's expansive, desolate landscapes. Connolly is known for his works that often explore social and political themes.

results.name: Penguin Bloom
results.description: Penguin Bloom tells the true story of Sam Bloom (Naomi Watts), a young mother whose world is turned upside down after a near-fatal accident leaves her unable to walk. Her family finds inspiration when they adopt an injured magpie chick named Penguin.

results.title: The Invisible Man
results.description: After staging his own suicide, a crazed scientist uses his power to become invisible to stalk and terrorize his ex-girlfriend. When the police refuse to believe her story, she decides to take matters into her own hands and fight back.

results.title: The Invisible Man
results.description: A scientist finds a way of becoming invisible, but in doing so, he becomes murderously insane.

results.name: Elisabeth Moss
results.known_for: Starring as Cecilia Kass in The Invisible Man (2020)

results.title: The Godfather
results.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

results.title: The Godfather Part II
results.description: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

results.title: The Godfather Part III
results.description: In the midst of trying to legitimize his business dealings in 1979 New York and Italy, aging mafia don, Michael Corleone seeks to vow for his sins while taking a young protégé under his wing.

results.name: Francis Ford Coppola
results.description: Director of 'The Godfather' series.

results.name: Marlon Brando
results.description: Played the role of Vito Corleone in 'The Godfather'.

results.name: Al Pacino
results.description: Played the role of Michael Corleone in 'The Godfather' series.

results.name: The Dry
results.description: Federal Agent Aaron Falk returns to his home town after an absence of over twenty years to attend the funeral of his childhood friend, Luke, who allegedly killed his wife and child before taking his own life – a victim of the madness that has ravaged this community after more than a decade of drought. When Falk reluctantly agrees to stay and investigate the crime, he opens up an old wound – the death of 17-year-old Ellie Deacon. Falk finds himself pitted against the prejudice towards him and pent-up rage of a terrified community.

results.title: The Invisible Man
results.description: When Cecilia's abusive ex takes his own life and leaves her his fortune, she suspects his death was a hoax. As a series of coincidences turn lethal, Cecilia works to prove that she is being hunted by someone nobody can see.

results.title: The Invisible Man Returns
results.description: The owner of a coal mining operation, falsely imprisoned for fratricide, takes a drug to make him invisible, even though it means he'll become peacefully insane.

results.title: The Invisible Man
results.biography: William Claude Rains, born in the Clapham area of London, was an English film and stage actor whose career spanned 46 years. His most famous role was that of the title character in the original The Invisible Man.

results.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
results.description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, Max teams up with Furiosa to flee from cult leader Immortan Joe and his army in an armored tanker truck, leading to a high-speed desert road battle.

results.title: The Dry
results.description: After being away for over twenty years, Federal Agent Aaron Falk returns to his drought-stricken hometown to attend a tragic funeral. However, his return opens a decades-old wound – the unsolved death of a teenage girl.

results.name: Robert Connolly
results.description: Robert Connolly is an Australian film director, producer, and screenwriter known for his works including 'The Dry', 'Paper Planes', and 'Balibo'.

results.name: Eric Bana
results.description: Eric Bana is an Australian actor and comedian. He started his career in the sketch comedy series 'Full Frontal' before gaining critical acclaim in biographical crime film 'Chopper'.

results.name: Avatar
results.synopsis: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

results.title: Avengers: Endgame
results.description: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War, the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

results.name: Casablanca
results.description: The classic 1942 romantic drama set during World War II where an American expatriate meets a former lover, with unforeseen complications.

results.name: Arrival
results.synopsis: When twelve mysterious spacecraft appear around the world, linguistics professor Louise Banks is tasked with interpreting the language of the apparent alien visitors.
